table.name: vtiger_sp_socialconnector
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_sp_socialconnector` ( `socialserviceconnectorid` int(11) DEFAULT '0', `message` text, `status` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_sp_socialconnectorcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_sp_socialconnectorcf` ( `socialserviceconnectorid` int(11) NOT NULL, `fb_status` varchar(155) DEFAULT NULL, `vk_status` varchar(155) DEFAULT NULL, `tw_status` varchar(155) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`socialserviceconnectorid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_sp_socialconnector_providers
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_sp_socialconnector_providers` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL, `provider_name` varchar(45) NOT NULL, `provider_domen` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
